did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files
1982-1983

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, Office Administrative Files, Accession #RG-2/1/2.851, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred to the library on 1986 Feb 11-16.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These files constitute the major record series generated by the president of the University of Virginia. The records consist chiefly of correspondence, but also include reports, minutes, clippings, memoranda, and related papers concerning all areas of business of the president's office.
The papers consist of: general files and administrative committee files, 1982-1983; and, permanent files, 1965-1984.

Permanent records concern: the Miller Center; the Center for Advanced Studies; the Development Capital Campaign; Southeastern University Association for Physics; and, ad hoc and special building committees.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p:
Series I: General Records, 1982-1983 Boxes 1-23
Series II: Administrative Committees, 1982-1983 Boxes 23-24
Series III: Permanent Files, 1965-1984 Boxes 25-39
Series IV: Restricted Material Box 40
